post.text: Donald Trump says he'd deport 16 million people. How do you even begin to quantify that?

comment.text: Everyone with a Spanish sounding name will be sent back to Mexico. It's going to cost us a lot of money, which the tax payer will pay for and many of our farms will be forced to close.
